com.penthera.virtuososdk

Class Common.LogLevelHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.penthera.virtuososdk.Common.LogLevelHelper
  • Enclosing class:
    Common
    public static final class Common.LogLevelHelper extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a static helper method which will deliver update messages to the necessary SDK processes to change the log level of the SDK.
    • Static Methods 
      Modifier and Type Static Method and Description
      updateLogLevel 
      static void updateLogLevel(int logLevel, Context context)
      This method will request the SDK to change logging level.
      public static final void updateLogLevel(int logLevel, Context context)
      This method will request the SDK to change logging level. The requested level is sent to each process in the SDK to be changed. This is an asynchronous action. Once set, the new log level will be persisted across SDK restarts. Please note that the production distribution of the SDK has some logging generation disabled. This means that not all logging will be generated on the production library despite it being possible to set the log level to debug or verbose.
      Parameters:
      logLevel - The new log level to set, from the constants defined in Common.LogLevels
      context - A valid context.
